title: Bug 7581: ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in property sheet
description: From ECJoe Winchester <JoeWin@us.ibm.com>, wrote in message news:3C407F76.31A82113@us.ibm.com...
OB: There is no observed behavior described in the bug report.
EB: I would have expected the behavior where the combo box is always the width of the property sheet column. I also expected the combo box to work the same as DialogCellEditor, where the button is always visible. Currently, the combo box is not sized correctly in the property sheet.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the property sheet.
2. Use a ComboBoxCellEditor for a property.
3. Observe that the combo box does not adjust its width to match the property sheet column width.
4. Compare this behavior with DialogCellEditor, where the button is always visible.
